commands.name: az automation hrwg create
commands.summary: Create a hybrid runbook worker group.
examples: az automation hrwg create --automation-account-name accountName --resource-group groupName --name hybridrunbookworkergroupName

commands.name: az automation hrwg delete
commands.summary: Delete a hybrid runbook worker group.
examples: az automation hrwg delete --automation-account-name accountName --resource-group groupName --name hybridrunbookworkergroupName

commands.name: az automation hrwg list
commands.summary: List all hybrid runbook worker groups.
examples: az automation hrwg list --automation-account-name accountName --resource-group groupName

commands.name: az automation hrwg show
examples: az automation hrwg show --automation-account-name accountName --resource-group groupName --name hybridrunbookworkergroupName

commands.name: az automation hrwg update
commands.summary: Update a hybrid runbook worker group.
commands.syntax:
az automation hrwg update [--add]
                          [--automation-account-name]
                          [--credential]
                          [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                          [--hybrid-runbook-worker-group-name]
                          [--ids]
                          [--remove]
                          [--resource-group]
                          [--set]
                          [--subscription]
examples: az automation hrwg update --automation-account-name accountName --resource-group groupName --name hybridrunbookworkergroupName --credential "{name: credentialname}"
